name: Super Nitrous Zoomer
description:
Buckle Up It's Go Time
Take control of an elemental zoomer and fly through this non-stop action game. It combines simple controls with challenging reflex oriented game play. As you race through the zoomer tunnel your goal is to last as long as you can while you accumulate zoomer coins. Purchase different zoomers in the shop with the coins you collect as you race. Last as long as you can and try and beat your previous record. With great music and fast paced action Super Nitrous Zoomer will provide hours of fun. Get your racing face on and let's go!

FEATURES

Endless Levels
Random Obstacles
High Score Tracker
Zoomer Shop(different characters to race with)
High Replay Value
Great Music
